Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory53.jpg'}
{3: 'Central Command — Outside the Training Operations Hall'}
{3: 'After routine firearm training, you rub your wrists, now slightly numb from holding a gun for so long, and open the tactical terminal to confirm your next destination.'}
{3: 'Walking to the corner of the hall, you bump into an unexpected person.'}
{2: 'No. 21?', 3: '9', 4: 'What are you doing here?', 5: '9'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I smelled something familiar, so I came to look for it.', 4: '1'}
{2: "What'd it smell like?", 3: '11'}
{3: 'No. 21 rummages through her pocket, takes out a somewhat dirty object, then raises her hand up toward you.'}
{3: 'A broken nameplate rests in the palm of her hand.'}
{3: "It's the same nameplate No. 21 had discovered earlier. You're surprised to see that she had taken it with her."}
{2: 'You mean, you found the owner?', 3: '17'}
{3: 'No. 21 nods, then shakes her head.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "They smell similar, but it's not the same person.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "There's only a subtle difference, but I can tell. They're from the same team.", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's some nose you got there...", 3: '22'}
{2: "If that's the case, you should return it to its rightful owner.", 3: '23'}
{2: 'Find the Construct and give it back.', 3: '25'}
{2: 'Because it might be important to them.', 3: '27'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Why would it be important?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You might find out if you return it to them.', 3: '30'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Alright. I want to know.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{3: "No. 21 walks around the Task Force base like a small animal foraging for food, then finally stops at the door to Nighthawk's break room."}
{3: 'A young Construct looking at his tactical terminal notices the strange visitor. He scratches his head in doubt.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: '...Who are you?', 4: '1'}
{2: "We're here to give this back.", 3: '39', 4: '(Looks at No. 21)', 5: '41'}
{3: 'Following this, No. 21 holds up the nameplate.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: '...We found this in battle.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'It\'s "something important," so I wanted to bring it back.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: "That nameplate... Ah! T-that's... Reynold's!"}
{3: "Seeing the thing in No. 21's hand, the Construct jumps out of his chair and rushes over. The chair makes a loud screech as it lurches back."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: "How did you find that? What about Reynold? He's been missing since the last battle. I thought...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'This is all I found.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: '...R-really?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'As if the last ounce of hope the Construct had clung to while waiting had vanished, he holds the nameplate firmly in his hands, falls to his knees, then begins to sob.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'This expression... Seems like you have lost something important.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 awkwardly holds her hands at her chest. The Co-Bot seems to share her bewilderment and runs around in circles.'}
{3: 'No. 21 looks at you in hesitation.'}
{3: 'After some time, she kneels down before the Construct as if suddenly thinking of something...'}
{3: 'As she tries to comfort him clumsily, her face distorts into an awkward, indescribable expression.'}
{3: 'It appears to be a disastrous attempt at a "smile." All you can see is No. 21 try to force the corners of her mouth up in a vague crescent.'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "W-what's... with that look on your face?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Do you think losing a comrade is funny?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "Oh, right... That symbol. You're with Cerberus, aren't you? I heard you all are a bunch of freaks!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The flustered Construct stands up and points at you.'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "Are you Cerberus' commandant? Shouldn't you keep your teammates in line?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Or... Are you just here to get a kick out of our misery?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "You cold-blooded monsters... No wonder you're on the same team.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "You're not welcome here. Please leave.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Construct wipes his face on his sleeve, then pushes you and No. 21 out.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: 'The door slams in your face with a loud "BANG!"'}
{3: 'No. 21 looks disappointed as she walks down the corridor.'}
{2: 'Are you okay?', 3: '87'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'My frame is operating at 100%.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why did you smile?', 3: '90', 4: 'Were you trying to comfort him?', 5: '90'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'He lost something important. He was "sad."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I wanted to "comfort" him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I\'ve learned from the speaking terminal that "smiling"" is a kind expression. So I deduced that this was the appropriate time to ""smile."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "That's what you would do, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'When you smile, Commandant, I feel warm here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She points to her chest.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I am learning how to converse with humans.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'But when I "smile," everyone is afraid.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "When I would smile in battle, the enemy was afraid. That's what Vera and Noctis did as well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Later, I learned that smiling can be "kind."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'But... I failed. My smile only makes people afraid.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Recalling Vera and Noctis' behavior, you instantly realize why No. 21 smiled like this."}
{3: "If she wants to learn how to talk with humans, Vera and Noctis aren't ideal teachers."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: '...Is it because I have no emotions?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I can only "imitate." Is that wrong?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No, of course not.', 3: '106'}
{2: "It's just that, everyone has their own way of expressing emotions.", 3: '107'}
{2: '"Smiling" has a lot of different meanings.', 3: '109'}
{2: "But it's often a sign of happiness.", 3: '110'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "...I don't understand. I don't have my own emotions.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I only have the "emotions" of others in here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 points at her head.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'But now they are gone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I don't know what I should do.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'But now I know not to do that when someone is sad.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Next time you run into him...', 3: '118'}
{2: "Just say you're sorry.", 3: '119'}
{2: 'In your own way.', 3: '120'}
